Title: The Journey of the Lost Artifact
Description: Retrieve the lost artifact and return it to the village elder. Be aware, your choices will shape the outcome!

Objectives.Description: Talk to the Village Elder to learn about the lost artifact.
Travel to the Enchanted Forest and find clues about the artifact.
Defeat the Guardian of the Forest.
Search the Ruins for the artifact.
Solve the Ancient Puzzle to access the hidden chamber.
Retrieve the Artifact from the hidden chamber.
You encounter a fork in the road: Choose to either take the longer but safer path (Path A) or the shorter, more dangerous path (Path B).
Navigate through the dense forest avoiding traps and ambushes.
Help a wounded traveler along the way.
Fight off a group of bandits who ambush you.
Cross a raging river using a rickety old bridge.
Regardless of the path taken, return to the Village with the artifact.
Present the Artifact to the Village Elder.
Receive your reward and the gratitude of the village.
